statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE units_sold > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT album_name, artist_name, units_sold FROM SalesData WHERE price_per_unit BETWEEN 10.50 AND 20.00
SELECT revenue, artist_name FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name FROM SalesData ORDER BY artist_name ASC
SELECT album_name, SUM(units_sold) AS total_units_sold FROM SalesData GROUP BY album_name HAVING total_units_sold > 500
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE units_sold > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC, revenue ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT artist_name, SUM(units_sold) AS total_units_sold FROM SalesData GROUP BY artist_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_units_sold DESC
SELECT album_name, artist_name, sale_date, price_per_unit FROM SalesData WHERE price_per_unit BETWEEN 20.00 AND 50.00 ORDER BY artist_name ASC, sale_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name FROM SalesData WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY artist_name ASC
SELECT album_name, SUM(units_sold) AS total_units_sold, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM SalesData GROUP BY album_name ORDER BY total_revenue DESC, total_units_sold DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT album_name, artist_name, units_sold FROM sales_data WHERE units_sold > 100 ORDER BY units_sold DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_date, total_revenue FROM sales_data WHERE total_revenue > 1000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, revenue_generated, recommended_actions FROM revenue_analysis;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE units_sold > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_id ASC
SELECT album_name, artist_name, total_revenue FROM sales_data WHERE total_revenue > 1000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, artist_name, units_sold FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY units_sold DESC
SELECT sale_id, album_name, units_sold, total_revenue FROM sales_data WHERE artist_name = 'Taylor Swift' OR artist_name = 'Adele' ORDER BY album_name ASC
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, revenue_generated, recommended_actions FROM revenue_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT album_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT sale_id, album_name, sale_date, customer_id FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT revenue_date, album_name, revenue_amount FROM revenue_data WHERE revenue_amount < 500;
SELECT analysis_id, date, total_sales, total_revenue, net_profit FROM financial_analysis;
SELECT sale_id, album_name, sale_date, sale_amount, customer_id FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT album_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM revenue_data WHERE revenue_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND revenue_amount < 5000;
SELECT album_name, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue_data GROUP BY album_name ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, date, total_sales, total_revenue, net_profit FROM financial_analysis WHERE total_sales > total_revenue;
SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT id, artist_name, album_name FROM sales ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, total_revenue FROM sales WHERE units_sold > 1000;
SELECT artist_name, album_name, total_revenue FROM sales JOIN albums ON sales.id = albums.artist_id;
SELECT artist_name, SUM(total_sales) AS total_sales FROM revenue_stats GROUP BY artist_name;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE artist_name = 'Taylor Swift';
SELECT album_name, units_sold, total_revenue FROM sales WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT artist_name, SUM(units_sold) AS total_units_sold FROM sales GROUP BY artist_name HAVING total_units_sold > 1000;
SELECT a.artist_name, b.album_name, s.total_revenue FROM artists a JOIN albums b ON a.artist_id = b.artist_id JOIN sales s ON b.album_id = s.id;
SELECT a.artist_name, COUNT(b.album_id) AS num_albums FROM artists a LEFT JOIN albums b ON a.artist_id = b.artist_id GROUP BY a.artist_name ORDER BY num_albums DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, total_sales, total_revenue FROM sales_summary WHERE total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 100 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT date, total_sales, total_revenue FROM sales_summary WHERE total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
